member.summary: Sets and gets the content of the UI element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.BulletChartLegendSettings.Alignment
member.summary: Sets and gets the legend in bullet chart can be aligned as follows: Near: Aligns the legend to the left of the bullet chart. Center: Aligns the legend to the center of the bullet chart. Far: Aligns the legend to the right of the bullet chart.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.BulletChartLegendSettings.Background
member.summary: Sets and gets the background color of the bullet chart legend that accepts value in hex and rgba as a valid CSS color string.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.BulletChartLegendSettings.Opacity
member.summary: Sets and gets the opacity of the bullet chart legend.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.BulletChartLegendSettings.Padding
member.summary: Sets and gets option to customize the padding between legend items.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.BulletChartLegendSettings.Position
member.summary: Position of the legend in the bullet chart are, Auto: Places the legend based on area type. Top: Displays the legend at the top of the bullet chart. Left: Displays the legend at the left of the bullet chart. Bottom: Displays the legend at the bottom of the bullet chart. Right: Displays the legend at the right of the bullet chart. Custom: Displays the legend based on the given x and y values.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.BulletChartLegendSettings.ShapeHeight
member.summary: Sets and gets the shape height of the bullet chart legend.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.Charts.BulletChartLegendSettings.ShapePadding
member.summary: Sets and gets the padding between the bullet chart legend shape and text.
